name: Charlie's Dungeon
description:
This was my pioneering project, where I started to program and create an 8-bit universe.

In it you will go on an adventure to recover a book for an old man that was stolen by Orcs.

To find and return this book you will need to go through some dangers and challenges.

Enjoy this little game and leave a feedback.

I intend to bring more short games in this style.

----

Buttons:

Z/Space - Interact

Q - Use Weapon

W - Use Item

---

Versions:

v1.1 -

  •  Fixed the RTP error.
  • Adjusted the volume of game sounds.
